root.name: Pyst
root.description: OverviewPyst is an adventure game parody of Myst developed by Parroty Interactive and published by Palladium Interactive for the PC and Mac platforms.Storyline The island of Pyst has been defiled by the millions of people who have visited it, and the King of Pyst (played by John Goodman) needs help to restore it to its former glory. There's a trailer at the end for a (canned) sequel.
